source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: Creating a Realistic 3D Backyard In Blender
items.headline: Improve your 3D modeling/rendering skills by creating a realistic backyard scene from scratch. Perfect for beginners.
objectives_summary: Develop skills and techniques necessary to produce photo-realistic exterior renderings.
Improve 3D modeling, lighting, texturing, shading and rendering skills.
Gain experience working with Blender.

items.title: Beginner's Guide to Creature Creation for Games
items.headline: Learn the complete pipeline to create a fully textured character ready for Unreal Engine 4.
objectives_summary: Sculpting
Retopology
PBR Texturing

items.title: Mastering AutoCAD Civil 3D: Working with surfaces
items.headline: A compilation of tips, skills, and techniques for intermediate-advanced users with a specific focus point.
objectives_summary: Expand existing knowledge of base models (existing ground surfaces), what data is available, and how Civil 3D interprets it.
Innovative techniques to work efficiently and productively to produce a solid design starting point.
Perform a civil engineering analysis of a surface from various aspects such as geo-technical and hydrological.

items.title: Introduction to V-ray for maya
items.headline: Learn the basics of Vray
objectives_summary: At the end of the training students will understand the basics of vray, how the tool system works, and can create a basic project from scratch.

items.title: Maya Particles Course: Dynamic Particles and Motion Graphic
items.headline: Easily implement effects with this 3d animation tutorial in nParticles, nCloth, paint effects, soft bodies and more.
objectives_summary: Navigate the complex structure of Maya Dynamics
Connect seemingly unconnected areas of Maya such as paint effects, soft bodies and particles
Be able to create a variety of effects using simple techniques

items.title: Lumion 8 - INTERIOR Photo Realistic Rendering
items.headline: Lumion 8 Master Class for Interior PHOTOREALISTIC Rendering Technic
objectives_summary: To know how to do a quick Photorealistic Rendering with Lumion 8
To know how to enhance Lumion Pre-set Style to the Photorealistic quality

items.title: 3D Animation: Basics To Full Body and Creature Mechanics
items.headline: Learn to animate a ball bounce, bounce with a tail, standard walk and a zombie crawl! After, get a personal critique!
objectives_summary: Understand the 12 Principles of Animation
You will be able to animate a ball bounce
You will understand overlap of a tail bouncing with the ball

items.title: Create Explainer Videos Using Adobe After Effects
items.headline: Learn how to create your own amazing Explainer Videos using Adobe After Effects
objectives_summary: Students will be able to create their own Explainer Videos in After Effects after taking this course.
Students will be able to use Animation Composer to create cool 2D animations in Adobe After Effects.

items.title: Design 3D Printed Enclosure for Arduino Boards Fusion 360

visible_instructors.name: Educational Engineering
visible_instructors.job_title: Team of skilled Engineers Sharing Knowledge with the World
visible_instructors.title: Educational Engineering Team

items.headline: Learn how to create 3D Printed Enclosure for any Custom Microcontroller or electronic Board like Arduino UNO and Mega
objectives_summary: Follow the trend in 3D Printing and manufacturing business
Create 3D Enclosure design For free
Create Your Frame using specific dimensions

items.title: Blender For Beginners + Learn to Create A Cartoon Character
items.headline: Learn Modeling , UV Unwrapping , Adding Materials , Texture Painting , Rigging , Animating And Much More In Blender
objectives_summary: Animating In Blender
Modeling In Blender
How To Use Blender To Create Characters

items.title: Learn ZBrush and Keyshot: Model Your Own Pirate Character
items.headline: Step by Step Training to Creating Fun Cartoon Characters in zBrush!
objectives_summary: Create Your Own Fun 3D Cartoon Characters
Learn Amazing Sculpting Techniques
Customize Your Workspace

items.title: Houdini for beginners
items.headline: Houdini doesn't have to be hard to learn. Take your first steps and create a product shot.
objectives_summary: The basics of Houdini
Basic modelling techniques
Rendering in Redshift

items.title: Blender 2.9 Grease Pencil First time Animation for Beginners
items.headline: Get started with Blender, free and powerful software for creating 2D & 3D animation and drawing , illustration
objectives_summary: Usage and basic operations
Coloring (material and vertex color)
Coloring (material texture)

items.title: Maya Rigging for Beginners- Part 1 (5 hours)
items.headline: An easy to follow course that simplifies the rigging process! *This course is just part 1, not the FULL course*
objectives_summary: Students will be able to use the basics of Maya interface
Students will be able to apply deformers and edit them

items.title: Rhino 3D Crash Course - Learn 3D Surfacing FAST
items.headline: Get started with Rhino TODAY
objectives_summary: Start modeling your designs in Rhino - today!
Follow along with 4 different sample projects, from beginner to advanced!
Learn the essential tools to make complex shapes easily

items.title: Blender: how to create the tiny k-2SO STAR WAR Robot
items.headline: Everything you need to create realistic Star War K-2SO Robot from start to finish with Blender and substance painter
objectives_summary: How to use blender and setup the scene
How to model any hard surface object
How to unwrap your object and prepare it for texturing
